featured.text: But no matter what a child eats, brushing after each meal is still the best way to fight cavities.
Male howler monkeys use their loud voices to fight for food, mates, or territory.
A man might once have fought a bear, for example, and the tales told about him might make him into the greatest bear fighter who ever lived.
She wanted to fight racial discrimination.
What did Dallas County do to fight off West Nile?

other.text: It is believed that the martial art was connected with tribal fighting in Africa, in which people fought body to body, without weapons, in order to acquire a bride or desired woman.
In this line of work, the person is paid to do daring actions that are deemed too 21 for the regular actor to perform, including jumping from heights, crashing cars, or fighting with weapons.
He participated in three revolutions and fought with people when he was insulted.
What is this passage mainly about? (A) West Nile and methods to fight it.
To gain more ______, some legislators would get into violent physical fights so that they may appear in TV news reports.
Capoeiristas learned to camouflage the forbidden fights with singing, clapping, and dancing as though it were simply entertainment.

definition.en_def: A violent confrontation between individuals or groups.
definition.example: The two friends had a fight over a misunderstanding.
